data.name: Failure_Invalid_Unpin
data.value: Matter you are trying to unpin is not pinned.
data.comment: This is a failure message when user tries to unpin a matter which is not pinned

data.name: Failure_Message
data.comment: This is a failure message for invalid service response

data.name: Failure_No_Pinned_Matters
data.comment: This is a failure message if no pinned matters are present

data.name: Fail_Attachment_Token
data.comment: This is a failure message if office API does not return attachment token

data.name: Loading_Message_Clients
data.value: Please wait while clients are being loaded...
data.comment: This is a loading message while clients are loaded

data.name: Loading_Message_Matters
data.value: Please wait while the matters load.
data.comment: This is a loading message while matters are loaded

data.name: Loading_Message_PinnedMatter
data.value: Please wait while pinned matters load.
data.comment: This is a loading message while pinned matters are loaded

data.name: Mail_Upload_Failure
data.comment: This is a success message when user failed to upload mail to SharePoint

data.name: Mail_Upload_Success
data.comment: This is a success message when user uploaded mail to SharePoint

data.name: No_Data_Message
data.comment: This message is displayed when no data is found

data.name: No_Subject_Mail
data.comment: This is a default subject line for mail with no subject

data.name: Search_Assigned_To_Me
data.comment: This text is displayed on auto-complete search options

data.name: Search_Entire_DMS
data.comment: This text is displayed on auto-complete search options

data.name: Upload_Failure
data.value: Something went wrong while uploading the file.
data.comment: This is a success message when user failed to upload documents from drag and drop

data.name: OneNoteTableOfContentsExtension
data.comment: This is the file extension of the OneNote table of contents

data.name: WOPIFrameURL
data.comment: This is the URL for the WOPIFrame that allows the user to open the OneNote for a matter

data.name: GridViewColumnFomatter
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of values whose function definition is already defined

data.name: GridViewColumnWidth
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of width of columns of grid view control

data.name: GridViewECBActions
data.value: Upload to this Matter,upload;View Matter Details,gotoMatterSites;Go to Matter OneNote,gotoOneNote;Pin this Matter,pin;Unpin this Matter,unpin
data.comment: Semicolon separated string of (comma separated string of actions,class) actions that are to be displayed in ECB menu

data.name: GridViewHeaderName
data.value: Matter,singleselect;ECB,NA;Client,singleselect;Client.Matter ID,NA;Modified date,date;Responsible attorney,singleselect;Sub area of law,singleselect;Open date,date
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of name of the column headers of grid view control

data.name: GridViewMatterIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for matter ID

data.name: GridViewTitleProperty
data.comment: This is the property name for matter title

data.name: MatterLandingPageExtension
data.comment: This is the file extension of the Matter Landing page

data.name: AutoComplete_Placeholder
data.value: Search by ID, or matter or client name
data.comment: Placeholder on Search bar for Outlook View

data.name: SearchDropdownFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated string of (comma separated string of options,class) options that are to be displayed in dropdown control

data.name: GridViewColumnValueFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of managed properties, which are used to bind JSON data

data.name: GridViewPinnedColumnValueFields
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of key names, which are used to bind JSON data

data.name: GridViewPinnedMatterIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for matter ID

data.name: GridViewPinnedTitleProperty
data.comment: This is the property name for matter title

data.name: GridViewPinnedClientMatterIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for client.matter ID

data.name: GridViewPinnedMatterClientIDPropertyName
data.comment: This is the property name for client ID

data.name: FilterRefinerClientName
data.comment: Managed property name for Client field

data.name: FilterRefinerResponsibleAttorney
data.comment: Managed property name for Responsible Attorney field

data.name: FilterRefinerSubAreaofLaw
data.comment: Managed property name for Sub area of law field

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedClientName
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned matter client

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedResponsibleAttorney
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned matter responsible attorney

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedSubAreaofLaw
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned matter sub area of law

data.name: GridViewColumnPickerFields
data.value: Matter;Client;Client.Matter ID;Modified date;Responsible attorney;Sub area of law;Open date
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of column options available in the column picker

data.name: GridViewNonDataColumns
data.comment: Name of non-data columns of grid view control

data.name: GridViewDefaultColumns
data.comment: Semicolon separated list of default columns in the grid view control. This list will be bypassed, if user selection exists

data.name: FilterRefinerOpenDate
data.comment: Managed property name for Open date

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedCreatedDate
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned matter created date

data.name: FilterRefinerPinnedModifiedDate
data.comment: This is the refiner name for pinned matter modified date

data.name: GridViewECBActionsTitle
data.value: Upload documents to this matter$|$Go to this matter\'s details$|$Go to this matter\'s OneNote$|$Add this matter to Pinned Matters$|$Remove this matter from Pinned Matters
data.comment: $|$ separated list of title for ECB actions

data.name: GridViewHeaderNameTitle
data.value: Click to sort by matter name$|$$|$Click to sort by client name$|$Click to sort by Client.Matter ID$|$Click to sort by last modified date$|$Click to sort by attorney$|$Click to sort by sub area of law$|$Click to sort by matter open date
data.comment: $|$ separated list of title for Grid view headers

data.name: GridViewECBMenuTitle
data.value: Click to view the matter menu
data.comment: Title for grid view ECB menu title
